name: OneButton (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: OneButton (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Cassandra JB.

This game is an infinite scroller where you dodge spikes. The rules/controls are explained in-game but the main thing is press space to jump and press & hold space to charge switch, release to switch.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
